text: Above the Rim is a 1994 American urban sports drama movie directed by Jeff Pollack. Duane Martin, Tupac Shakur, Leon and Marlon Wayans star. The movie is set in New York City and is about drugs and basketball. ==Sources== == Other websites == * Category:1994 crime drama movies Category:1990s sports movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:American sports drama movies
title: Above the Rim
